titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Boxer. Without written report.

reference.label: text of measure as reported in Senate

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

term.name: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works

bill.summary: 9/17/2013--Reported to Senate without amendment. Authorizes expenditures by the Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works for the 113th Congress.
